body.p: To create a Business Rule Service Project, open WSO2 Developer Studio Dashboard and select Business Rule Service Project from Business Rule Server category.
There are two ways to create a rule service.

With the New Business Rule Service option, you will get an empty rule service according to the information that you have provided. At the same time, you can upload a Rule Service Conffiguration file with the extension of .rsl from the file system.
If you select New Business Rule Service option, and click Next, wizard page will ask you general information like Project Name, Rule Service Name etc. Give necessary information and click Next.
After giving necessary information, click Finish. Now you will see that the created Rule Service has opened with Graphical Rule Services Editor.
With this Graphical Editor, you can add different Rules, Operations etc in a very convenient manner.
With the Import Business Rule Service option, you can browse for rule service configuration (rsl) file in your file system.
Now you will see a new Rule Service Project has been created in the workspace and the rule service configuration (rsl) file open with graphical editor.

You can export your rule service project as a Carbon Application Project and create the Carbon Application Archive [CAR] and deploy in to the Carbon Server. When grouping your project as a Carbon Application Archive [CAR], it will create you a aar file, which you can deploy in to any WSO2 Business Rules Services Server.
